articles.author: Caroline Kenny, CNN
articles.title: Georgia Sen. Kelly Loeffler tests positive for Covid but is undergoing further testing
articles.description: Georgia Republican Sen. Kelly Loeffler has tested positive for Covid-19, her campaign announced.

articles.author: CNN
articles.title: READ: Judge's order dismissing Trump campaign Pennsylvania lawsuit
articles.description: Judge Matthew Brann of the US District Court in the Middle District of Pennsylvania dealt a death blow on Saturday to the Trump campaign's effort to overturn President-elect Joe Biden's victory. Read Brann's order below.

articles.author: Arman Azad And Alaa Elassar
articles.title: FDA authorizes use of Regeneron's antibody cocktail given to Trump to treat Covid-19
articles.description: The US Food and Drug Administration on Saturday issued an emergency use authorization for Regeneron's antibody cocktail to treat Covid-19 in high-risk patients with mild to moderate disease.

articles.author: By Nectar Gan, Akanksha Sharma and Pauline Lockwood, CNN
articles.title: The Hong Kong-Singapore 'travel bubble' is postponed amid Covid-19 spike
articles.description: The highly-anticipated Hong Kong and Singapore "air travel bubble" was postponed Saturday -- less than 24 hours before it was due to launch.

articles.author: Jay Croft, CNN
articles.title: Scranton, Pennsylvania, honors famous 'scrappy kid' turned President-elect
articles.description: As President-elect Joe Biden prepares to move into the White House, his hometown honored him Friday just steps from his childhood home.

articles.title: 'Absolutely shameful': Schiff condemns Trump's golf outing
articles.description: After attending a portion of the virtual G20 summit, President Donald Trump skipped a special session on the coronavirus pandemic, choosing to play golf instead. California Rep. Adam Schiff says Trump's actions are "appalling."

articles.title: The only way Republicans can lead again

articles.title: NFL star's wife apologizes for 'dictatorship' rant
articles.description: Kelly Stafford, wife of longtime Detroit Lions quarterback Matthew Stafford, apologized on Instagram after calling Michigan a "dictatorship" in response to the state's new Covid-19 restrictions.

articles.author: Nicky Robertson, CNN
articles.title: Judge rules Voice of America head curbed First Amendment rights of its journalists
articles.description: The chief executive of the agency that oversees Voice of America and his team must stop investigating and interfering with the journalists employed there, a federal judge ruled Friday.

articles.title: WH correspondent: Liz Cheney adding to GOP pressure on Trump
articles.description: A federal judge dismissed a lawsuit by the Trump campaign trying to invalidate millions of Pennsylvania mail-in votes. CNN's Jeremy Diamond reports US District Court Judge Matthew Brann admonished the Trump campaign lawyers for not presenting factual proof fo…

articles.author: Dakin Andone, Elizabeth Joseph and Lauren del Valle, CNN
articles.title: Kentucky's attorney general joins federal lawsuit against governor's order halting in-person learning
articles.description: Kentucky Attorney General Daniel Cameron has joined a federal lawsuit against an executive order issued by Gov. Andy Beshear to close schools to limit the spread of Covid-19.

articles.title: Federal judge dismisses Trump campaign Pennsylvania lawsuit
articles.description: A federal judge dealt a death blow to the Trump campaign's effort to overturn President-elect Joe Biden's win of the presidency on Saturday, by dismissing a closely watched lawsuit that sought to invalidate millions of Pennsylvania votes.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Despite Covid travel warnings, more than 1 million people passed through US airports Friday
articles.description: Despite a record number of new Covid cases and the Centers for Disease Control recommending against traveling for Thanksgiving, Friday and Saturday were two of the busiest days at US airports since the pandemic brought air travel to a near halt in March.

articles.title: Biden's mistake about Trump
articles.description: Frida Ghitis writes that President-elect Joe Biden is making a big mistake letting President Donald Trump continue to spread false and dangerous claims on the election results.

articles.title: Analyst on if electors can vote against their state's popular vote
articles.description: CNN legal analyst Elie Honig breaks down the likelihood of any of the lawsuits waged by the Trump team changing the outcome of the 2020 election and whether or not electors can vote against their state's popular vote.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: A police department is mourning a K-9 killed in the line of duty
articles.description: A Tennessee police department is mourning the loss of a K-9 officer that died after suffering gunshot wounds when a man opened fire on a patrol car.

articles.title: 'Left me dumbfounded': CNN anchor on Fox News correspondent's suggestion
articles.description: CNN's Erica Hill talks to former White House communications director Anthony Scaramucci about a suggestion made by Fox News correspondent Geraldo Rivera that a Covid-19 vaccine should be named after President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Long lines form outside of food banks ahead of the holiday
articles.description: CNN's Paul Vercammen reports from a Los Angeles food bank where long lines of those in need ahead of the holiday season shows the devastating economic impact of the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.author: Kelsie Smith, CNN
articles.title: Sia defends casting a nondisabled actor to portray a person with autism in her upcoming film 'Music'
articles.description: Pop singer Sia is responding to the backlash to her upcoming film that has been criticized for casting a nondisabled actor to portray a character who has autism. And she's furious.
